description: A second year. Admired by the boys, she is very self-conscious when people stare at her. Although she doesn`t like people looking at her, she likes to look at members of the opposite sex or anything that resembles them. She is a a very skilled swimmer as she almost won the Kantou Tournament in 200 meters the year before the series starts. Her grandfather is the creator of the Shizu Group.
name: Shizuoka Mirei
